Uses of Package
elki.math.geometry

  • Packages that use elki.math.geometry 
    Package Description
    elki.algorithm
    Miscellaneous algorithms.
    elki.clustering.hierarchical
    Hierarchical agglomerative clustering (HAC).
    elki.evaluation.outlier
    Evaluate an outlier score using a misclassification based cost model.
    elki.evaluation.scores
    Evaluation of rankings and scorings.
    elki.math.geometry
    Algorithms from computational geometry.
    elki.result.textwriter.writers
    Serialization handlers for individual data types.
    elki.visualization.parallel3d.layout
    Layouting algorithms for 3D parallel coordinate plots.
    elki.visualization.svg
    Base SVG functionality (generation, markers, thumbnails, export, ...).
    elki.visualization.visualizers.visunproj
    Visualizers that do not use a particular projection.
  • Classes in elki.math.geometry used by elki.algorithm 
    Class Description
    XYCurve
    An XYCurve is an ordered collection of 2d points, meant for chart generation.
  • Classes in elki.math.geometry used by elki.clustering.hierarchical 
    Class Description
    PrimsMinimumSpanningTree.Adapter
    Adapter interface to allow use with different data representations.

    Interface for collecting edges.

    Class Description
    PrimsMinimumSpanningTree.Adapter
    Adapter interface to allow use with different data representations.
    PrimsMinimumSpanningTree.Array2DAdapter
    Adapter for a simple 2d double matrix.
    PrimsMinimumSpanningTree.Collector
    Interface for collecting edges.
    SweepHullDelaunay2D.Orientation
    The possible orientations two triangles can have to each other.
    SweepHullDelaunay2D.Triangle
    Class representing a triangle, by referencing points in a list.
    XYCurve
    An XYCurve is an ordered collection of 2d points, meant for chart generation.
    XYCurve.Itr
    Iterator for the curve. 2D, does not follow Java collections style.
    XYPlot.Curve
    Curve on this plot.
    XYPlot.Curve.Itr
    Iterator for the curve. 2D, does not follow Java collections style.
